Title: Directs the division of criminal justice services to study the state of the police department in the village of Hempstead
Summary: Directs the division of criminal justice services to study the state of the police department in the village of Hempstead regarding the policies, practices and finances of the police department and regarding the state of public safety in the village.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the division of criminal justice services to study the state of the police department in the village of Hempstead and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
